dia_brief.name: Tear
dia_brief.txt: This is a high priority request from AG Venus. Venus City is reporting widespread power outages, and all attempts to contact staff at the underground canal have failed.
Surveillance footage shows no visible signs of entry, however the entrance you lot took last time has been destroyed, suggesting that this may be an act of sabotage from one of the workers.
There is far too little information on the situation at present, so your mission is purely to survey the area and report back.
Additionally, since there is no telling what you could encounter there, AG Venus has once again requested the assistance of Layered as well.
Cooperate with their forces, and navigate the canals with extreme caution - the extent of the structural damage may very well extend beyond just the entrance. Good luck.

dia_intro.name: Tear
dia_intro.txt: You've reached the control center. This entrance is on the opposite end to the one you've used before, so once you've reached the center you should start looking for familiar pathways to help orient yourselves.

dia_intro.name: Imo'lei
dia_intro.txt: Right. You said take it slow, but do we know if those knights beat us to the-
Oh, great. Guess that answers my question.
As a Knight of Layered I'll take your asses to the slammer on grounds of obstructing- ah, hang about.
I getcha, you're the squad of ugly ducklings the guild sent to help, aincha?
Funny, your knight buddy I had to bail out last time didn't think much of me either.
...Heh, ya don't say? Guess I'll see for myself, but if ya really can keep up then we'll get on just peachy.

dia_intro.name: Harzer
dia_intro.txt: Harzer Kurtzfelt. Still got half a mind to deck ya, but we can save it 'till we're off the clock, yea? Work before play and all that.

dia_intro.name: Imo'lei
dia_intro.txt: Likewise. Mind my business if you mind yours.

dia_01.name: Aile
dia_01.txt: I-I can't find anything like it on record... was it added recently?

dia_01.name: Paprika
dia_01.txt: I dunno Aile, that... doesn't look right...

dia_01.name: Harzer
dia_01.txt: Oy, break's over! Hell of a lot more where that came from if you haven't noticed!

dia_01.name: Imo'lei
dia_01.txt: Hmph, hell of a lot of me to go around, too!

dia_outro.name: Imo'lei
dia_outro.txt: Tch, there's just no end to these things!

dia_outro.name: Harzer
dia_outro.txt: You got that right, I'm gettin' the hell outta dodge, I suggest ya do the same.

dia_outro.name: Imo'lei
dia_outro.txt: Oh? All that big talk and now you've got your tail between your legs?

dia_outro.name: Harzer
dia_outro.txt: Cut the crap, girlie! This mission's a goddamn wash, and we ALL need to beat it!

dia_outro.name: Tear
dia_outro.txt: She's right. The mission was simply to investigate the situation, and we've seen more than enough to report back.

dia_outro.name: Tear
dia_outro.txt: Imo we don't have time to-
